project_plan.name: Python Multiple-Choice Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design and implement a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of their score, and displays it at the end of the game.

task.name: Implement main quiz logic to display questions and capture user input
Keep track of user's score throughout the quiz
Display the user's score at the end of the game
Write tests for the quiz functionality
Execute tests to ensure all features are functioning correctly
